Package middlewareapd.util

Class ValidationUtilTest

java.lang.Object
middlewareapd.util.ValidationUtilTest
public class ValidationUtilTest extends Object
Unit tests for the ValidationUtil class.

This class tests the utility methods used for validating UUIDs and user roles to ensure that they function correctly and throw appropriate exceptions when the validation fails.

Test Methods:
  • testValidUuid() - Verifies that valid UUIDs pass the validation without exceptions.
  • testInvalidUuid() - Ensures that invalid UUIDs throw an UnauthorizedException.
  • testValidUserRole() - Checks that valid user roles pass the validation without exceptions.
  • testInvalidUserRole() - Verifies that mismatched user roles throw an UnauthorizedException.

  • Constructor Details

      public ValidationUtilTest()

  • Method Details

    • testValidUuid

      @Test public void testValidUuid()
      Tests the ValidationUtil.validateUuid(String, String) method with matching UUIDs.

      This test ensures that no exception is thrown when the database UUID and the extracted UUID are identical.

    • testInvalidUuid

      @Test public void testInvalidUuid()
      Tests the ValidationUtil.validateUuid(String, String) method with non-matching UUIDs.

      This test verifies that an UnauthorizedException is thrown when the extracted UUID does not match the database UUID.

    • testValidUserRole

      @Test public void testValidUserRole()
      Tests the ValidationUtil.validateUserRole(Integer, int) method with matching user roles.

      This test ensures that no exception is thrown when the stored user role matches the expected role.

    • testInvalidUserRole

      @Test public void testInvalidUserRole()
      Tests the ValidationUtil.validateUserRole(Integer, int) method with non-matching user roles.

      This test verifies that an UnauthorizedException is thrown when the stored user role does not match the expected role.
